quote: I Was Influenced A Lot By Those Around Me - There Was A Lot Of Singing That Went On In The Cotton Fields.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: My Father Always Told Me That All Businessmen Were Sons Of Bitches, But I Never Believed It Till Now.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I'm the greatest, I'm a bad man, and I'm pretty!
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: What One Writer Can Make In The Solitude Of One Room Is Something No Power Can Easily Destroy.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: There Are Several Good Protections Against Temptation, But The Surest Is Cowardice.
author: Mark Twain
